00045 template <class T, bool E=true>
00046 class FifoQueue {
00047 private:
00048 #if !defined(QUEUELOG)
00049 // write to screen/debug-stream
00050 void QUEUELOG(const char *str, ...)
00051 {
00052         #if defined(_LOG_TO_STDOUT)
00053                 va_list ptr;
00054                 va_start(ptr,str);
00055                 vprintf(str,ptr);
00056         #else
00057         //#ifdef _LOG_TO_DBVIEW
00058                 char buf[2048];
00059 
00060                 va_list ptr;
00061                 va_start(ptr,str);
00062                 vsprintf(buf,str,ptr);
00063 
00064                 OutputDebugString(buf);
00065         #endif
00066 }
00067 #endif
00068 protected:
00069         size_t m_maxCount;
00070         size_t m_currentCount;
00071         size_t m_first;
00072         bool m_deleteOnOverwrite;
00073 
00074         T*      m_list;
00075 public:
00076         typedef T               value_type;             
00077         typedef size_t  size_type;              
00078 
00080         FifoQueue(size_type size=16, bool delOnOverwrite = true)
00081         {
00082                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.new (base), T=%s, size=%d, del=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),size,delOnOverwrite);
00083 
00084                 if (size > 0)
00085                         m_maxCount = size;
00086                 else
00087                         m_maxCount = 1;
00088                 m_list = new T[m_maxCount];
00089                 m_currentCount = 0;
00090                 m_first = 0;
00091                 m_deleteOnOverwrite = delOnOverwrite;
00092         }
00093         
00095         template <bool E2>
00096         FifoQueue(const FifoQueue<T,E2>& q)
00097         {
00098                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.new (copy), T=%s, size=%d, count=%d, del=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),q.m_maxCount,q.m_currentCount,q.m_deleteOnOverwrite);
00099                 m_maxCount = q.m_maxCount;
00100                 m_list = new T[m_maxCount];
00101                 m_currentCount = q.m_currentCount;
00102                 m_deleteOnOverwrite = q.m_deleteOnOverwrite;
00103                 m_first = 0;
00104                 for (size_t i = 0;i<m_currentCount;++i)
00105                         m_list[i] = q.m_list[(i+q.m_first) % m_maxCount];
00106         }
00107         
00108         void eraseAndClear(void)
00109         {
00110                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.eraseAndClear, T=%s, count=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_currentCount);
00111                 for (size_t i = 0;i<m_currentCount;++i)
00112                         delete m_list[(i+m_first) % m_maxCount];
00113                 m_currentCount = 0;
00114                 m_first = 0;
00115         }
00116 
00118         ~FifoQueue()
00119         {
00120                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.delete, T=%s, count=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_currentCount);
00121                 if (E)
00122                         eraseAndClear();
00123                 m_maxCount = 0;
00124                 delete[] m_list;
00125         }
00126 
00128         template <bool E2>
00129         FifoQueue<T,E>& operator=(const FifoQueue<T,E2>& q)
00130         {
00131                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.operator =, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d, smax=%d, scount=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount,q.m_maxCount,q.m_currentCount);
00132                 if (m_maxCount != q.m_maxCount)
00133                 {
00134                         delete[] m_list;
00135                         m_maxCount = q.m_maxCount;
00136                         m_list = new T[m_maxCount];
00137                 }
00138                 m_currentCount = q.m_currentCount;
00139                 m_first = 0;
00140                 for (size_t i = 0;i<m_currentCount;++i)
00141                         m_list[i] = q.m_list[(i+q.m_first) % m_maxCount];
00142 
00143                 return *this;
00144         }
00145         
00147         void resize(const size_t size)
00148         {
00149                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.resize, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d, size=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount,size);
00150                 if (E)
00151                         eraseAndClear();
00152                 delete[] m_list;
00153                 if (size > 0)
00154                         m_maxCount = size;
00155                 else
00156                         m_maxCount = 1;
00157                 m_list = new T[m_maxCount];
00158                 m_currentCount = 0;
00159                 m_first = 0;
00160         }
00161 
00163         bool empty() const
00164         {
00165                 return (m_currentCount == 0);
00166         }
00167         
00169         size_type size() const
00170         {
00171                 return m_maxCount;
00172         }
00173         
00175         size_type length() const
00176         {
00177                 return m_currentCount;
00178         }
00179 
00181         value_type& front()
00182         {
00183                 return m_list[m_first];
00184         }
00185         
00187         const value_type& front() const
00188         {
00189                 return m_list[m_first];
00190         }
00191         
00193         value_type& back()
00194         {
00195                 return m_list[(m_first + m_currentCount - 1) % m_maxCount];
00196         }
00197         
00199         const value_type& back() const
00200         {
00201                 return m_list[(m_first + m_currentCount - 1) % m_maxCount];
00202         }
00203         
00205         void push(const value_type& x)
00206         {
00207                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.push, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d, x=%p\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount,x);
00208                 if (m_currentCount == m_maxCount)
00209                 {
00210                         if (m_deleteOnOverwrite)
00211                                 delete (m_list[m_first]);
00212                         
00213                         m_list[m_first] = x;
00214                         m_first = (m_first+1) % m_maxCount;
00215                 }
00216                 else
00217                 {
00218                         m_list[(m_first + m_currentCount++) % m_maxCount] = x;
00219                 }
00220         }
00221         
00223         void pop(void)
00224         {
00225                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.pop, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount);
00226                 m_first = (m_first+1) % m_maxCount;
00227                 --m_currentCount;
00228         }
00229 
00231         void popBack(void)
00232         {
00233                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.popBack, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount);
00234                 --m_currentCount;
00235         }
00236 
00238         const value_type& operator[] (size_t index) const
00239         {
00240                 if (index >= m_currentCount)
00241                         return m_list[(m_first + m_currentCount - 1) % m_maxCount];
00242                 else
00243                         return m_list[(m_first + index) % m_maxCount];
00244         }
00245 
00247         value_type& operator[] (size_t index)
00248         {
00249                 if (index >= m_currentCount)
00250                         return m_list[(m_first + m_currentCount - 1) % m_maxCount];
00251                 else
00252                         return m_list[(m_first + index) % m_maxCount];
00253         }
00254 
00255         void clear(void)
00256         {
00257                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.clear, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount);
00258                 m_currentCount = 0;
00259                 m_first = 0;
00260         }
00261 
00262         void remove(size_t index)
00263         {
00264                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueue.remove, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d, index=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount,index);
00265                 if (index >= m_currentCount)
00266                         return;
00267                 if (index == 0)
00268                         pop();
00269                 else
00270                 {
00271                         --m_currentCount;
00272                         for (size_t i=index;i<m_currentCount;++i)
00273                                 m_list[(m_first + i) % m_maxCount] = m_list[(1 + m_first + i) % m_maxCount];
00274                 }
00275         }
00276 };

00437         void push(const value_type& x)
00438         {
00439                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueueBase.push, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d, x=%p\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount,x);
00440                 if (m_currentCount == m_maxCount)
00441                 {
00442                         m_list[m_first] = x;
00443                         m_first = (m_first+1) % m_maxCount;
00444                 }
00445                 else
00446                 {
00447                         m_list[(m_first + m_currentCount++) % m_maxCount] = x;
00448                 }
00449         }
00450 
00452         void push_front(const value_type& x)
00453         {
00454                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueueBase.push_front, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d, x=%p\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount,x);
00455                 m_first = (m_first+m_maxCount-1)%m_maxCount;
00456                 if (m_currentCount == 0)
00457                         m_first = 0;
00458                 m_list[m_first] = x;
00459                 if (m_currentCount < m_maxCount)
00460                         ++m_currentCount;
00461         }
00462 
00464         void pop(void)
00465         {
00466                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueueBase.pop, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount);
00467                 if (m_currentCount > 0)
00468                 {
00469                         m_first = (m_first+1) % m_maxCount;
00470                         --m_currentCount;
00471                 }
00472         }
00473 
00475         void popBack(void)
00476         {
00477                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueueBase.popBack, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount);
00478                 if (m_currentCount > 0)
00479                         --m_currentCount;
00480         }

00504                 m_first = 0;

00507         void remove(size_t index)
00508         {
00509                 QUEUELOG("[%p]FifoQueueBase.remove, T=%s, max=%d, count=%d, index=%d\n",this,typeid(T).name(),m_maxCount,m_currentCount,index);
00510                 if (index >= m_currentCount)
00511                         return;
00512                 if (index == 0)
00513                         pop();
00514                 else
00515                 {
00516                         --m_currentCount;
00517                         for (size_t i=index;i<m_currentCount;++i)
00518                                 m_list[(m_first + i) % m_maxCount] = m_list[(1 + m_first + i) % m_maxCount];
